Posts.Content: Mar 1, 2013 09:14AM poisonivy wrote: BCmomof3,  I am new to this site and am wondering how you are doing? My sister's story is very similiar to yours.  She had Stage III breast cancer, had a double mas., went through a year of chemo and radiation.  That was 2 1/2 years ago and now the cancer is back and she is now Stage IV and it is in her lymph nodes and on her skin.  She has a PET scan on Saturday to see if it spread to her organs.  Please pray for her as she has four kids and her husband at home.
Posts.Title: 3 Years Remission... now stage IV... Help! BcMomOf3 SAMayoFL
